name: Angry Gnome
description:
Once upon a time there was a gnome.His name was Sumotryas. He has his own chest filled with gold like any good gnome. Oneday after returning home from a nearby forest, where he was visiting his old friend, The gnome found his cozy home looted. There were broken furniture and dishes on the floor. It looked like the robbers worked thoroughly and apparently found what they were looking for. The chest with magical coins was stolen. Our friend will go on a journey to return what he has stolen and he already knows where to visit for the first place......
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
This game is a 2.5 D side-scroller. The history is developed in several thematic zones,

full of dangers, so in Frozen Lands it is possible to freeze without heat source for a long time, and in the Blazing Swamps it is possible to get into a lava easily or another trap. Traps are that's not all, you should struggle with various enemies having the features, in passing solving puzzles. At the end of each zone you will battle against the Boss having the unique tactics of fight, it won't be boring.
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
In the course of the game you should develop the character. The system of development is provided by 4 branches:

____________
The Сonstitution - the character becomes more hardy and hardy.
____________
The Mechanic - allows to use bombs, to interact with mechanisms, when you open skill and assemble certain number of spare parts you turn into the fighting Golem.
____________
The Master of weapon - allows to use different types of the near attacks and to throw the axe.
____________
The Shaman - allows to accumulate rage and to turn into mighty Fenrir.
____________
